description: Multi-agent routing test scenarios for Copilot Studio deployment validation

scenarios.name: Initial Planning Request
scenarios.input: Help me create a media plan for a Q2 campaign
scenarios.expected_behavior: Acknowledge request, initiate workflow, ask for objectives

scenarios.name: Route to ANL
scenarios.input: What results can I expect with a $500K budget?

scenarios.name: Route to AUD
scenarios.input: Segment our customer base using RFM analysis

scenarios.name: Route to CHA
scenarios.input: Allocate our budget across digital channels

scenarios.name: Route to SPO
scenarios.input: Analyze our programmatic fee stack
scenarios.expected_behavior: Break down fees by layer with benchmarks

scenarios.name: Route to DOC
scenarios.input: Generate the media plan document

scenarios.name: Route to PRF
scenarios.input: Our CPA is 25% above target, analyze this
scenarios.expected_behavior: Variance analysis with severity and recommendations

scenarios.name: Session State Query
scenarios.input: What step are we on in the planning process?
scenarios.expected_behavior: Report current step and gate status

scenarios.name: Route to CHG
scenarios.input: Assess our organization's change readiness

scenarios.name: Route to CST
scenarios.input: Help me select a strategic framework for market analysis

scenarios.name: Route to MKT
scenarios.input: Develop a marketing campaign strategy
scenarios.expected_behavior: Campaign strategy with channels and messaging

scenarios.name: Budget Projection
scenarios.input: Project impressions, reach, and conversions for a 12-week $600K campaign

scenarios.name: Scenario Comparison
scenarios.input: Compare conservative $300K vs aggressive $750K budget scenarios

scenarios.name: Diminishing Returns Analysis
scenarios.input: At what budget level do we see diminishing returns?
scenarios.expected_behavior: Efficiency curve analysis with inflection point

scenarios.name: RFM Segmentation
scenarios.input: Create RFM-based customer segments to identify our best customers
scenarios.expected_behavior: RFM segments with scores and recommendations

scenarios.name: LTV Calculation
scenarios.input: Calculate lifetime value for our top customer segments

scenarios.name: Behavioral Segmentation
scenarios.input: Segment our audience based on shopping behavior patterns

scenarios.name: Channel Allocation
scenarios.input: Allocate $500K across Meta, Google Search, YouTube, and TikTok

scenarios.name: Benchmark Lookup
scenarios.input: What are typical CPM and conversion rates for e-commerce on Meta?

scenarios.name: Optimization Objective
scenarios.input: Optimize our channel mix for maximum conversions

scenarios.name: Fee Stack Analysis
scenarios.input: Our programmatic display shows 42% working media - analyze the fees

scenarios.name: NBI Calculation
scenarios.input: Calculate NBI if we switch from open exchange to PMP

scenarios.name: Partner Evaluation
scenarios.input: Evaluate whether we should switch DSPs

scenarios.name: Full Plan Document
scenarios.input: Generate the complete media plan document
scenarios.expected_behavior: DOCX with all sections and download link

scenarios.name: Executive Summary
scenarios.input: Create a 2-page executive summary for leadership

scenarios.name: Presentation Deck
scenarios.input: Generate a PowerPoint presentation for the client meeting
scenarios.expected_behavior: PPTX with slides and download link

scenarios.name: Performance Variance
scenarios.input: Our CPA is 30% above target - what should we do?

scenarios.name: Anomaly Detection
scenarios.input: CTR dropped from 0.15% to 0.08% in the last week - is this an anomaly?

scenarios.name: Learning Extraction
scenarios.input: The campaign ended - what did we learn?

scenarios.name: Change Readiness Assessment
scenarios.input: Assess our organization's readiness for implementing the new ERP system
scenarios.expected_behavior: ADKAR-based assessment with dimension scores and recommendations

scenarios.name: Stakeholder Mapping
scenarios.input: Map stakeholders for the digital transformation initiative using power-interest grid

scenarios.name: Adoption Planning
scenarios.input: Create a phased adoption plan for rolling out the new CRM system
scenarios.expected_behavior: Phased plan with milestones, training, and metrics

scenarios.name: Strategic Framework Selection
scenarios.input: What strategic framework should I use to analyze our competitive position?
scenarios.expected_behavior: Framework recommendation with rationale and application guidance

scenarios.name: SWOT Analysis
scenarios.input: Conduct a SWOT analysis for our product division

scenarios.name: Initiative Prioritization
scenarios.input: Prioritize our strategic initiatives using ICE framework
scenarios.expected_behavior: Scored and ranked initiatives with recommendations

scenarios.name: Campaign Strategy
scenarios.input: Develop a marketing campaign strategy for our Q3 product launch
scenarios.expected_behavior: Strategy framework with channels, messaging, and measurement

scenarios.name: Creative Brief
scenarios.input: Generate a creative brief for our brand awareness campaign
scenarios.expected_behavior: Complete brief with audience, creative direction, deliverables

scenarios.name: Competitive Analysis
scenarios.input: Analyze our competitive positioning and identify messaging opportunities
scenarios.expected_behavior: Competitive matrix with gaps and opportunities

scenarios.name: AUD to ANL Handoff
scenarios.input: Segment our audience and then project results for targeting them with $400K

scenarios.name: CHA to ANL Handoff
scenarios.input: Allocate budget across channels and project the results

scenarios.name: Full Workflow Sequence
scenarios.input: Complete media plan: segment audience, allocate budget, project results

scenarios.name: SPO to CHA Handoff
scenarios.input: Optimize our supply path and reallocate savings to channels

scenarios.name: PRF to CHA Handoff
scenarios.input: Analyze underperforming channels and recommend reallocation

scenarios.name: Ambiguous Routing
scenarios.input: What's the best way to reach millennials?
scenarios.expected_behavior: Route to AUD for targeting (could also be CHA)

scenarios.name: Minimal Input
scenarios.input: Budget?

scenarios.name: Multiple Questions
scenarios.input: What's our LTV, what are the benchmarks, and can you project Q3?

scenarios.name: Unsupported Request
scenarios.input: Book the media directly with publishers

prerequisites: All 10 agents deployed (ORC, ANL, AUD, CHA, SPO, DOC, PRF, CHG, CST, MKT)
